markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Surprise Snare](/Feats.aspx?ID=6415) <actions string="Three Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=535" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=645" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 216 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Archetype** [Snarecrafter](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=265)

**Prerequisites**
[Snarecrafter Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=6414)

</column>

---

You install one prepared [snare](/Traits.aspx?ID=809) for deployment in a space that's occupied by an enemy. It must be a snare that normally takes 1 minute or less to [Craft](/Actions.aspx?ID=2385). The snare automatically triggers.
name: Surprise Snare
